tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  LECTURE HEAVY
comments: Be sure to read what he assigns and don\'t be afraid to ask questions. He\'s actually very funny if you can pay attention and he\'s very intelligent on the subject. He\'s probably the nicest professor I\'ve taken.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
stu_tags: AMAZING LECTURES  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GET READY TO READ
comments: I have Professor Shober right now for Intro to Political Science, and I really enjoy how he makes the lectures interesting and has a good sense of humor without trying too hard. He lets you know what he wants up front, and is pretty amiable. I haven\'t ever seen him upset or angry.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: A very nice guy and a pretty decent teacher. You\'ll have to listen to him talk for a long time about kind of boring topics, but he likes showing videos and stuff so it\'s not terrible. A pretty easy grader, too.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Professor Shober is very knowledgable about his subject matter, and loves to share what he knows what others. An all around great guy and professor.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Very unclear when explaining his expectations on assignments and exams.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Schober is a lot of fun and a great teacher for an intro level. He does occasionally go on tangents, but it\'s fun to see how much he loves poly sci. He\'s friendly and helpful as well.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: I like Shober a lot, actually. His lectures can seem unorganized and unclear, but if you do the reading before hand, they make more sense. Also, he is very down to earth, so ask him questions! Shober is also hilarious! He grades fairly.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Shober is adorable. His lectures are kind of rambling, but if he\'s about to tell you something that you need to know for a test, he\'ll tell you. He\'s a surprisingly picky grader, but if you go to see him during office hours, he is fantastically helpful. The Shober you see in class is just the tip of an iceberg.
